reviewText: it and the face lift are both great and using  one on one day and the other on the next day  As  I turned 76 six today think I have started out to late but  have seen improvement in my face if I keep it up will see a plus in my body.

Every Monday morning I meet with friends to start our week with yoga practice. This morning I brought my DVD of 10 Minute Natural Body Lift and everyone LOVED it; the perfect mix of yoga and pilates; stretching and strength. It is fantastic!!
I got a sneak preview of Danielle Collins' Natural Body Lift on my cable ON DEMAND channel.  Even though it was just a short version of this DVD I had to buy it.  Glad I did.
